thread.section_title: Hotel Exquis by Elegancia - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely boutique hotel - Review of Hotel Exquis by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sabi_P81
title: Lovely boutique hotel
text:
This hotel was in a great location for me and my wife.
We was walking distance from the bustling Bastille and had many lovely restaraunts around us.
The staff are so friendly and spoke great English as our French is not the best they would greet you with a smile no matter how many times you came in or out.. breakfast was served until 11 so you could have a nice lay in, wasn't a full on breakfast but just enough to start your day.
We was close to the Metro which we used to get around all over Paris.
The hotel was clean and tidy and the little things like the weather for the day written every morning inside the lift.
Would come back here if to ever visit Paris again.
